summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for a retaining wall at the south margin of Yesler Way, east of 4th Avenue, for the Yesler Way Bridge over 4th Avenue, authorizing the hiring of consultants in such connection, providing for the completion of plans, specifications and cost estimates for the replacement of said bridge, authorizing construction of such retaining wall and bridge, and making an appropriation from the Seattle General Street Improvement Bond 1960 Fund therefor.
